summary: A controversial talk show host becomes involved in the murder of a beautiful woman in a war for ratings.
cast: Eric Roberts|Lisa Thornhill|Jason Gedrick|Jack Betts|Michael Mantell|Jennie Garth|Jim Fyfe|Stephen Tobolowsky|Sadie Stratton|Leslie Bega|Kristin Dattilo|Leonora Scelfo|James Pickens Jr.|Tara Ellison|Kimberly Flynn|Matt Letscher|Mike Kartman|Jacqueline Wang
title: Power 98
